dimensions: Warp: 53.5 cm (21 in.). Weft: 63.5 cm (25 in.) Selvedge present at right. Pattern: Height of repeat: 18 cm (7 in.). Width of repeat: 12 cm (4 3/4 in.)
title: Textile
provenance: Formerly in the collection of Elinor Merrell where it was No. 18 on her list of chefs de piece.
medium: Technique: block-printed with resist paste on plain weave foundation. Immersion dyed in indigo vat.
description: Fan-like shapes sprouting small leaves in an off-set arrangement.
name: Textile
